full_summary:
### Skid Steer Tender

#### Notice Information

* [Reference Number](#reference-number): WS3806713202
* [Solicitation Number](#solicitation-number): WS3806713202
* [Publication Date](#publication-date): January 25, 2023
* [Tender Closing Date](#tender-closing-date): February 17, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* [Notice Type](#notice-type): Request for Proposal (RFQ)

#### Tender Details

* [Procurement Category](#procurement-category): Goods and Services (GD)
* [Notice Type](#notice-type): Competitive
* [Selective Tendering Method](#tendering-method): Selective Tendering
* [Selection Criteria](#selection-criteria): Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* [Trade Agreements](#trade-agreements): Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* [Regions of Opportunity](#regions-of-opportunity): None
* [Regions of Delivery](#regions-of-delivery): Nunavut Territory
* [Contracting Entity](#contracting-entity): Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR) has a requirement to purchase a Skid steer for delivery to the Canadian High Arctic Research Station located in Cambridge Bay, Nunavut.

### Important Details

* **_Tender Closing Date and Time_:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 17, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this date and time will be declared non-responsive.
* **_Delivery Date_:** The Skid steer must be delivered on or before March 31, 2023.

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications regarding the tender, please contact:

Tanis Parobec (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [tanis.parobec@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanis.parobec@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
       tanis.parobec@tpsgc-pwgsc
